Html:
Hi, first thanks to radioman for this great project.

I have a lat/lon location and am looking for the closest road, way, path in the (openstreet) map. What I would need is the polygon and name of the road (maybe a MapRoute). Much like ﻿﻿﻿GetRouteBetweenPoints, but providing only a single point and get the whole road as an array of PointLatLng.

Is there a way to achieve this?

(The actual task is to aling a lot of GPS collected points to existing roads)

Thanks for any hint

Gerhard

I currently use openstreetmap API to retrieve map data by bounding box. (see http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Downloading_data). I thought there might be a more general way to do this for different map sources.

Thanks anyhow

Gerhard
